snippet.title: NFS Unbound: Vol. 9 Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Ride or die with your crew in Vol.9: Prepare for Lockdown*, one of our most high-stakes mode yet, taking the NFS risk reward formula to new heights and continuing our quest to deliver the most complete NFS experience in one place for the first time, with the addition of this all-new PvPvE multiplayer mode. 

Break into Lockups with your crew, using bikes for the first time in NFS history. 

Claim the Hot Rides inside, including Racer X’s Custom BMW M3 GTR ‘05 and 14 rides inspired by Most Wanted's Blacklist and more! 

Escape the Lockdown Zone by claiming the Extraction Truck, and you get to keep them to use across Free Roam, PVP and Lockdown, alongside the new fully customizable SUBARU Impreza WRX STI ’99 and Honda Integra Type R ’98 from the Speedpass**. 

PVP is refreshed with motorbikes, NFS 30 Year anniversary celebration and drift pro playlists. Volume 9 also comes with a new Speed Pass, and an optional Premium track offering a total of 75 tiers of unlockable content. Developed by Criterion Games and published by Electronic Arts, with release on November 26th. 

*Requires NFS Unbound (sold separately) and all game updates to play
** Premium Speedpass entitlement required for Honda Integra Type R ‘98

Follow us everywhere 👉 https://linktree.com/needforspeed
